snippet: The influence of John Holdren, a physicist and White House science adviser, can be seen in a number of policies, including the plan to cut power plants’ carbon dioxide emissions.
abstract: Influence of White House science adviser John Holdren can be seen in many of the Obama administration's policies, including plan to cut power plant emissions of carbon dioxide, main contributor to global warming; Holdren has focused on climate change and its perils for much of his four-decade career, and his view and pivotal role in the administration have put him in cross hairs of critics.
lead_paragraph: The influence of John Holdren, a physicist and White House science adviser, can be seen in a number of policies, including the plan to cut power plants’ carbon dioxide emissions.

headline.seo: John Holdren’s Influence Seen in Obama Policies
headline.main: Obama Adviser on Front Lines of Climate Fight
headline.print_headline: Obama Adviser on Front Lines of Climate Fight
